Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Jackson, LaSalle, Monroe and Dearborn, SB: Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams near Jackson/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Dearborn due to police activity near Jackson/Dearborn.

Northbound buses will operate via Jackson, Lasalle, Monroe and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp. rerouted NB: Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark; SB: Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark near Clark/Catalpa.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Clark/Catalpa, due to street blockage near Clark/Catalpa.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr, Clark and over regular route.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster, Clark and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Ridgeland, Division, Austin, North Avenue and Narragansett: near Ridgeland/North Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Narragansett, Ridgeland, Division, Austin, North Avenue, Narragansett and over regular route: near Ridgeland/North Ave.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to mechanical problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to mechanical problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#52 Kedzie/California

#49 Western

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
